もこけね:Record.NAME: Record
もこけね:Record.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the next !M! cards played this turn to your draw pile. NL They cost 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:SuppressingStrike.NAME: Suppressing Strike
もこけね:SuppressingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 もこけね:Seal.

もこけね:Repose.NAME: Repose
もこけね:Repose.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !M! もこけね:Seals. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:AntiquityBurden.NAME: Antiquity's Burden
もこけね:AntiquityBurden.DESCRIPTION: Enemy's Vulnerable stacks additively until the end of the turn. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:Restraint.NAME: Restraint
もこけね:Restraint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 もこけね:Seal.

もこけね:Forget.NAME: Forget
もこけね:Forget.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak to the enemy whenever it loses HP this turn.

もこけね:Purify.NAME: Purify
もこけね:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:Feint.NAME: Feint
もこけね:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy other than the target.

もこけね:Execration.NAME: Execration
もこけね:Execration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Strength.

もこけね:Protector.NAME: Protector
もこけね:Protector.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card in your partner's hand.

もこけね:Prosperity.NAME: Prosperity
もこけね:Prosperity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL もこけね:Echo Power: Play a copy of the Power.

もこけね:Replicate.NAME: Replicate
もこけね:Replicate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Add !M! new copies of it to your hand.

もこけね:Revision.NAME: Revision
もこけね:Revision.DESCRIPTION: Move any number of cards from your hand to your partner's hand.

もこけね:Disparity.NAME: Disparity
もこけね:Disparity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for ALL your cards that did not start in your deck.

もこけね:Hardcover.NAME: Hardcover
もこけね:Hardcover.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL もこけね:Echo Power: Gain !M! Artifact.

もこけね:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
もこけね:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable for each enemy in combat.

もこけね:Inhibition.NAME: Inhibition
もこけね:Inhibition.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! もこけね:Seal.
もこけね:Inhibition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! もこけね:Seal.

もこけね:Release.NAME: Release
もこけね:Release.DESCRIPTION: Lose all もこけね:Seals. NL Summon a もこけね:Spark for each もこけね:Seal lost. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:Reflection.NAME: Reflection
もこけね:Reflection.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Your partner gains [E] for each card discarded. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:Reminisce.NAME: Reminisce
もこけね:Reminisce.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of the enemy's debuffs. NL Deal !D! damage for each debuff removed.

もこけね:Huddle.NAME: Huddle
もこけね:Huddle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card each.

もこけね:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
もこけね:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

もこけね:Singe.NAME: Singe
もこけね:Singe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Burn to your hand.

もこけね:Ignition.NAME: Ignition
もこけね:Ignition.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would gain Strength, summon a もこけね:Spark instead.

もこけね:Smokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
もこけね:Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Summon a もこけね:Spark.

もこけね:Refute.NAME: Refute
もこけね:Refute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in a discard pile.

もこけね:Tragedy.NAME: Tragedy
もこけね:Tragedy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each stack of Weak and Vulnerable the enemy has.

もこけね:Indomitable.NAME: Indomitable
もこけね:Indomitable.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

もこけね:Sinister.NAME: Sinister
もこけね:Sinister.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL もこけね:Echo Attack: Deal !M! damage.

もこけね:Stabilize.NAME: Stabilize
もこけね:Stabilize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL もこけね:Echo Skill: Gain !M! Block.

もこけね:SealingRite.NAME: Sealing Rite
もこけね:SealingRite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 もこけね:Seal for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:FujiyamaVolcano.NAME: Fujiyama Volcano
もこけね:FujiyamaVolcano.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Summon a もこけね:Spark for each card Exhausted.

もこけね:Blitz.NAME: Blitz
もこけね:Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Deal !D! damage twice.
もこけね:Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw a card.

もこけね:Ruthless.NAME: Ruthless
もこけね:Ruthless.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy dies, gain !M! Strength.
もこけね:Ruthless.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever an enemy dies, gain !M! Strength.

もこけね:Kindle.NAME: Kindle
もこけね:Kindle.DESCRIPTION: Your partner gains NL [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

もこけね:PhoenixCall.NAME: Phoenix's Call
もこけね:PhoenixCall.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

もこけね:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
もこけね:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Stun. NL Skip your next turn. NL Exhaust.
